content:
Sure, here are some other animal-themed attractions you might enjoy with your kids:

1. SeaWorld Orlando - This park has many aquariums where kids can see marine life up close. They can also watch killer whale, dolphin, and sea lion shows. 2. Gatorland - Kids can safely see and even handle alligators and crocodiles. The park also has a petting zoo, zip line course, and exotic bird exhibit. 3. The Central Florida Zoo & Botanical Gardens - Kids can meet giraffes, pygmy hippos, and other animals. The zoo also has a carousel and splash pad for hot days. 4. Busch Gardens Tampa Bay - This wildlife park has a variety of animal exhibits, including tigers, lions, and zebras. There are also several rides and attractions for kids. 5. Brevard Zoo - Located nearby in Melbourne, Florida, this zoo has a variety of animals including kangaroos, cheetahs, and sloths. The Treetop Trek is a popular attraction for older kids. 6. Wild Florida Airboats - This family-owned attraction provides airboat rides through Florida's scenic wetlands, where guests can see alligators, birds, and other wildlife. They also have a drive-thru safari park with exotic animals like zebras and giraffes. 7. Exotic Animal Experience - This private animal sanctuary offers up-close encounters with exotic animals such as lions, leopards, and kangaroos, under the guidance of experienced handlers. Hope this helps provide some new options for you and your family!
